name: Mr.Market
description: This is highly alpha code. Do not use it or you will lose all your money

scripts.install:all: npm run install:interface && npm run install:server
scripts.start: npm run start:server & npm run start:interface
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix interface
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix server && npm run lint --prefix interface
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: npm run test --prefix server && npm run test:unit --prefix interface
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e --prefix server && npm run test:e2e --prefix interface
